page.title: 07Food Eaten in Eglwysbach
page.content: I have cornflakes for breakfast every morning and I drink pure orange juice. In school we have something different every day but mainly chips or potatoes with some vegetable like peas, carrots or cabbage. Every Wednesday I serve pudding and I get a big portion. I can prepare tomato soup, make coffee and toast. When I visit other towns I like to have hamburgers, chips and coke. My favourite meal is Sunday dinner when we have chicken, potatoes, peas, carrots and gravy. For tea we sometimes have beans and chips or fish-fingers,sausage and chips. I do not like tomatoes but I like tomato soup somehow. Before I go to bed I have a biscuit and a cup of coffee.
